categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Tryla was a female Human Jedi Initiate enrolled in the Coruscant Jedi Temple's academy during the final decade of the Galactic Republic.

A Human female, Tryla was identified as Force-sensitive and given over to the Jedi Order for training in the ways of the Force. Assigned to an Initiate Clan, Tryla was interested to hear stories of the mysterious Darth Maul.

When the Clone Wars erupted between the Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, Tryla and a group of fellow students, including Cryle and Ammon, accompanied Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker on a training mission to a jungle planet.
